SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Combat Exposure Scale - Did you ever go on combat patrols or have other dangerous duty?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CES - Ever Combat Patrols or Dangerous Duty

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: CES01-Were You Ever Under Enemy Fire
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Combat Exposure Scale - Were you ever under enemy fire?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CES - Were You Ever Under Enemy Fire

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Combat Exposure Scale - Were you ever surrounded by the enemy?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CES - Ever Surrounded by the Enemy

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: CES01-Soldiers in Unit KIA, Wounded, MIA
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Combat Exposure Scale - What percentage of the soldiers in your unit were killed (KIA), wounded or missing in action (MIA)?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CES - Soldiers in Unit Killed (KIA), Wounded, Missing (MIA)

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: CES01-How Often Fire Rounds at Enemy
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Combat Exposure Scale - How often did you fire rounds at the enemy?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CES - How Often Fire Rounds at Enemy

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Combat Exposure Scale - How often did you see someone hit by incoming or outgoing rounds?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CES - See Someone Hit by Rounds

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Combat Exposure Scale - How often were you in danger of being injured or killed (i.e., being pinned down, overrun, ambushed, near miss, etc.)?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CES - In Danger of Being Injured or Killed
